## Description {#details}

Data for each alias pattern.

Includes feature bits, string, number of operands, and a variadic list of conditions to check.

Definition at line 194 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcinstprinter-h">MCInstPrinter.h</a>.
